description: Let the slow cooker do all the hard work for you, and up your veg quota at the same time, with this warming cheesy cauliflower and spinach soup.
name: Slow Cooker Cheesy Cauliflower & Spinach Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium washed white potatoes, roughly chopped
1.5 cups Woolworths shredded light tasty cheese
6 1cm-thick slices sourdough ancient grains & sprouted seeds miche

recipeInstructions.text: Place celery, onion, cauliflower, potato, garlic, stock and 2 cups water in a 5.5L slow cooker. Cover with lid and cook on low for 6 hours (or high for 3 hours) or until vegetables are tender. Add three-quarters of the spinach and cook, covered with lid, for 5 minutes or until spinach has wilted. Turn off slow cooker.
Using a stick blender, blend soup until smooth. Stir in cheese. Season with pepper.
Ladle soup into bowls. Dollop a little yoghurt into each bowl, then swirl over top. Top with remaining spinach and sprinkle with dukkah. Drizzle with oil, then serve with bread.
